@stefanolson @piwakawakaracin But we'd have to look a lot more closely at it to be able to make a call on merits of privatisation vs private contracted management vs all of it being run by councils / new entities.

@shananhalbert The Bill winds up making it less likely that new international players enter the market. 
The Minister can designate them as being subject to the wholesale supply requirements 5 years after starting operations.
Thread below. It's a problem.

https://t.co/2Y1iW9KmA4

Whatever you think of the merits of forcing a new entrant to supply rent-seeking Kiwi competitors at government-chosen prices, think for half a second about the effects on new entry. 
Why would anyone open shop here when it's subject to this kind of threat?
